btuMC003 Which Witch Is Which?
Rarity: Rare
Looking for Inventory Management? Please Login w/ "Remember Me?" option selected.
Which Witch Is Which?
Keywords: Detective , Mystery Inc.
CLUE EFFECT: Scooby Gang - When a friendly character with a listed keyword uses Perplex to target an opposing character, after resolutions gain 1 Clue token.
SUSPECT (3) - Once per turn, when an opposing character uses Shape Change, you may reroll the result.
CASE CLOSED (9) - When an opposing character is knocked back, after resolutions deal that character 1 penetrating damage.

Mystery Card
During force construction, you may include any number of Mystery Cards on your Sideline. All Mystery Cards are UNIQUE.

Each Mystery Card has a list of keywords and a CLUE EFFECT that allows that card to gain Clue tokens. When a CLUE EFFECT is triggered, place a Clue token on that card. If multiple Mystery Cards have the same named CLUE EFFECT, you may only place a Clue token on one of those cards when that named CLUE EFFECT is triggered.

Each Mystery Card has effects that may be used while the number of Clue tokens on that card is equal to or greater than the number listed in parenthesis next to that effect. All CLUE EFFECTS and named effects have SIDELINE ACTIVE.
